favourite.article: Hallelujah! Soften me and mould me, and for Thy will prepare.
This strikes a chord with me - FS Turney was my great grandfather and I'm able to hear and appreciate his sentiments and music through modern technology. I'm proud to be a member of his family.
Bend me; don't break me, Lord, until I reflect Your image: "Till others see upon me" Thy face. This song is exactly my prayer--that God will change me into His design for me.
